dc_description_s: This line shapefile depicts the major rivers in Kenya. These data were created by the U.S. National Imagery and Mapping Agency in 1997. This layer was used throughout multiple maps in "Natures Benefits in Kenya: An Atlas of Ecosystems and Human Well-Being." This data was used in maps featured in Natures Benefits in Kenya: An Atlas of Ecosystems and Human Well-Being. United States. National Imagery and Mapping Agency. (1997). Major Rivers: Kenya, 1997. NIMA. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/pg314jj2851 Original data are available at http://mapping.usgs.gov/esic/cdrom/vmap.html. Data set is not for use in litigation. While efforts have been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the state of the art, WRI, cannot assume liability for any damages, or misrepresentations, caused by any inaccuracies in the data, or as a result of the data to be used on a particular system. WRI makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
dc_publisher_s: United States. National Imagery and Mapping Agency
dc_creator_sm: United States. National Imagery and Mapping Agency
